name: Morph Design System
description:
Adaptable, swift, integrated


Morph is an adaptable design system that includes guidelines and components to build more consistent digital products to meet several tastes. In addition to being matchable with various brand books and templates, Morph emphasizes design principles such as accessibility.


All styles in this system design, including dimensions, colors, and other features, are adaptable with digital products such as mobile applications, admin panels, and websites with high accuracy in multiple languages in the RTL and LTR directions and various colors pallets pf light and dark mode.


By using morph, designing and implementing digital products will be efficient. The main specifications of this design system are the principles of beauty, simplicity, being user-centered, and accessibility.

The design of the morph system has been published for free by the design team of Setare Aval Company which is constantly enhancing.
